TopicTitle: How to remove the volume limit on eva construction

Articles.Content:
Hi Everyone!

I came back to Kerbal Space Program after a few years hiatus when I heard that Kerbal Space Program 2 was in development. I am absolutely loving the new material that's been added.

I am particularly enjoying the EVA construction mode. I really like the idea that I can fix my mistakes. Is there any way to remove the volume limit on parts? I would very much like to move a SEQ-24 large storage container from a rocket to mobile processing lab. I'm not afraid of installing mods, but I'd like to keep the game as vanilla as possible (with the exception of science here and now, kerbal engineer, and the docking alignment thingy).

(I'm currently high up in Duna's SOI. If I recall correctly, the SEQ-24 is .4 tonnes, so I should be well within the weight limit. And I set constructionWeightLimit to 9999 in Physics.cfg.)

Thanks!
As this would require a mod, this question has been moved to add-on discussion.
